channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

Between driveway to Kingston House and entrance to no 2 Windsor Street GL52 2DE

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Windsor Street, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: People parking and we can't get out, 2nd November
item.description:
We have bad parking on Jesson Road, Linworth Road and other surrounding Roads it happens every day Monday to Friday as we have a school on Two Hedges Road and I use a mobility scooter and so does my neighbour and tonight Cleeve School had a event on tonight and people were parked everywhere and me and my neighbour couldn't go out, 2 buses nearly crashed because they couldn't get through due to the bad parking.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Jesson Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bend and Reduce Speed sign is on it's side on the verge and no longer visible., 1st November
item.description:
The road sign warning of a sharp bend is flattened and hidden on the verge. It is on the Cheltenham bound side of the B4632 near the entrance to Dryfield Farm.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Road marking white lines or studs

item.title: Outside 6 Arle Gardens., 1st November
item.description:
Previous roadworks left the road looking as the photo, which is not good enough. The road has been like this for many years, despite me trying to address it with the GCC. Whenever it rains water congregates in the dip, as the photo. In very heavy rain the puddle is even bigger and worse. Visitors to my house have to be careful where they park, otherwise passengers step out of vehicles straight into the water. I am disabled and getting into and out of vehicles can be challenging enough, without getting wet feet.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Arle Gardens, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sinking road, 1st November
item.description:
Approximately a 1/3 of the way down the slip road from East bound A40 onto the M5 J11 roundabout (right hand lane), the road has a large section that appears to be sinking causing the cars to dip, and lurch on the way out it. This has been there for a number of months.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Give way sign hit by reversing lorry, 1st November
item.description:
Give way sign just outside of the star college was bit twice by a reversing articulated HGV reg: DK70 ZKA, on Friday 31st around 10:19 after the driver came upon an obstruction and attempted to turn around using the cross junction, Struck the sign, exited the vehicle, looked at the sign then got back in and continued maneuvering and drove off

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ullenwood Manor Lane, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)
